example[0]: There was a complimentary bottle of champagne in the hotel room.
example[1]: I’ve got some complimentary tickets for the theatre tonight.
definition[1]: saying that you admire someone or something
example[3]: Jennie was very complimentary about Katharine’s riding.
definition[2]: complimentary food, goods, services etc are given free to customers or clients
example[4]: You will receive a complimentary bottle of wine on arrival at your hotel.
